segments.text: My latte looks like that shoe polish we did an ad for last month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And this espresso looks like ... oil !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: These days , I can't think of anything but motor oil . Even coffee makes me think of it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait a second ! There's the idea for this case ! “ Your motor oil should be as choice and fresh as your morning coffee . ”
segments.speaker: S1
